Header.title: we are care for your steps
Header.paragraph: New Beginnings . Endless Possibilities . The Education You Want. The Attention You Deserve on one place ...

About.paragraph: FIRST STEP is a unique resource for anyone interested in undergraduate education, science and technology, economic and ethnic diversity, student success, and other characteristics of the world's undergraduates and the colleges they attend.

Services.name: Get Matched
Services.text: We offer a search, matching and search service in the widest network of universities and students

Services.name: Pin Your Favorite
Services.text: keep an eye on the college you are interested by pinning them to top of your list

Services.name: Compare
Services.text: See how your pinned college stack up to each other on the factor that matter to you most with compare view.

Services.name: SAVE
Services.text: With a few simple steps . you can save your progress and come back to your search later.

Services.name: ACCESS
Services.text: Access to universities and communicate with universities via e-mail and other means of communication.

Services.name: MAP IT
Services.text: want a bird's-eye view of your matching college? Add some geographic perspective to your result with the map future.

Features.title: Refine your search
Features.text: Select your search destination and choose the options that suit you.

Features.title: Build a list
Features.text: You can build a list of the options you chose and come back to it later.

Features.title: comparisons
Features.text: You can compare universities and specializations you want and specializations by region.

Features.title: Save your session
Features.text: Save your own file and modify it at any time you want and customize it for you.
